name: James, Son of Alpheus
troparia: (Tone 3) Holy apostle James, intercede with the merciful God* to grant to our souls* forgiveness of sins.
kontakia: (Tone 2) With praises let us all extol James as a herald of God;* he firmly planted the doctrines of wisdom in the souls of the godly.* For he stands before the Masterâ€™s throne of glory* and rejoices with all the angels* unceasingly praying for all of us.
